content: round 27 st round 20 4dc invdec *7dc invdec* repeat ** 3dc 24 st round 21 double_crochet to end of round 24 st round 22 *2dc invdec* repeat ** to end of round 18 st round 23 double_crochet to end of round 18 st round 24 *double_crochet invdec* repeat ** to end of round 12 st slip_stitch invisible fasten_off leave a long tail for making up stuff body with fibrefill ensure that the jog at round 14 where the colour change occurred faces the back head start with white yarn foundation 6 fldc magic_ring round 1 2 fldc in each st 12 st round 2 *2 fldc in 1 st fldc * repeat ** to end of round 18 st round 3 *2 fldc in 1 st 2 fldc * repeat ** to end of round 24 st round 4 fldc to end of round 24 st round 5 *2 fldc in 1 st 3 fldc * repeat ** to end of round 30 st round 6 15 fldc change to pale orange 15 double_crochet to end of round 30 st round 7 change to white *2 fldc in 1 st 4 fldc * 3 times change to pale orange *2 double_crochet in 1 st 4dc * to end of round 36 st round 8-9 change to white 18 fldc change to pale orange 18 double_crochet 36 st round 10 double_crochet change to white 3fldc *fldec 4 fldc* twice fldec fldc change to pale orange 3dc *inv decrease 4dc* twice inv decrease double_crochet 30 st round 11 double_crochet change to white 14 fldc change to pale orange double_crochet to end of round 30 st round 12 invdec change to white *3dc invdec* 3 times 2dc change to pale orange *invdec 3dc* 3 times 24 st round 13 double_crochet change to white 11 double_crochet change to pale orange 12 double_crochet 24 st round 14 *2dc invdec* repeat ** to end of round 18 st round 15 *double_crochet invdec* repeat ** to end of round 12 st slip_stitch invisible fasten_off leave a long tail for making up insert safety eyes between rounds 9 and 10 about 5-6 stitches apart see image right stuff head with fibrefill and sew to the body referring to the image use pink yarn to embroider a straight stitch on the cheeks and buff yarn to sew eyebrows 3 stitches wide over each eye using pale orange yarn sew the ears to each side of the head just in front of the hair between rounds 7-10 using bouillon stitch © akabekobotan 2023 coat the coat is worked in row turning chains do not count as stitches if you find the piece curling at the edges try turning the work in the opposite direction when you begin the next row use cream yarn leave a long starting tail for sewing up row 1 rs chain 14 insert hook into 2nd chain from hook working into the back of the chain double_crochet to end turn 13st row 2 ch1 double_crochet
